Class ArchiveComment

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.core.ArchiveComment
public class ArchiveComment extends Object

This class is a data model for an AO3 comment. ArchiveIngestor uses this to store relevant comment information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    creationHash
    This attribute stores the unique SHA-256 generated by the story's information.
    ZonedDateTime
    creationTimestamp
    This attribute stores the time and date when the story object is created.
    Integer
    depth
    This attribute stores how deep the comment is in a thread of replies.
    Integer
    page
    This attribute stores the page number the comment was found on.
    String
    posted
    This attribute stores the date and time the comment was posted.
    ArrayList<ArchiveComment>
    replies
    This attribute stores the replies the comment has.
    ArrayList<String>
    text
    This attribute stores the actual text of the comment.
    String
    user
    This attribute stores the user that posted the comment.

    This constructor starts a comment object.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveComment

      public ArchiveComment(String user, String posted, ArrayList<String> text, Integer depth, Integer page)

      This constructor starts a comment object.

      Parameters:
      user - The user that posted the comment.
      posted - The date and time the comment was posted.
      text - The actual text of the comment.
      depth - How deep the comment is in a thread of replies.
      page - The page number the comment was found on.

  • Method Details

    • setReplies

      public void setReplies(ArrayList<ArchiveComment> replies)

      This method sets the replies attribute of the comment.

      Parameters:
      replies -

    • convertCommentArrayListToJSON

      public static org.json.JSONArray convertCommentArrayListToJSON(ArrayList<ArchiveComment> commentArray)

      This static method converts an arraylist of archive comments to JSON format.

      Parameters:
      commentArray - The arraylist of archive comments.
      Returns:
      A JSON representation of a list of comments.

    • getJSONRep

      public org.json.JSONObject getJSONRep()

      This method retrieves a JSONObject representation of the comment.

      Returns:
      JSONObject representation of the comment.
